name: Robotic Ressources
description:
A short game about a Robot that has to solve the mystery as to why the humans have disappeared without a trace, while solving tasks for other bots and being confused as to where everyone went.

In this game you can walk around and talk to NPC's that will give you either quests (View Questlist) or more story. The game itself is very short and maybe a bit rushed at some point, but i hope you still enjoy it.
